meanings.definition: A person who is excessively puritanical or moralistic.
meanings.sent1: The bluenoses in our town disapprove of any form of entertainment.
meanings.sent2: The bluenoses at the meeting criticized the new art exhibit for being too provocative.
meanings.sent3: The bluenoses were scandalized when they saw the children playing with water guns.
meanings.sent4: The bluenoses viewed the colorful street art as a sign of moral decay.
meanings.sent5: The bluenoses' disapproving glares made everyone feel self-conscious.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are overly strict or conservative in their beliefs or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The bluenoses in the neighborhood always complain about the noise from the park.
meanings.sent2: The bluenoses in the community center insisted on following all the rules to the letter.
meanings.sent3: The bluenoses raised their eyebrows at the sight of the teenagers skateboarding in the square.
meanings.sent4: The bluenoses saw any deviation from tradition as a threat to their way of life.
meanings.sent5: The bluenoses' rigid attitudes made it difficult for new ideas to be accepted.
